member.name: T:Ai.Hong.Controls.Chart.ShowTrackerAndLeaveOpenBehavior
member.summary: Normal OxyPlot behavior is to show the tracker when the bound mouse button is pressed, and hide it again when the button is released. With this behavior set, the tracker will stay open until the user clicks the plot outside it (or the plot is modified). usage:PlotView behaviors:ShowTrackerAndLeaveOpenBehavior.BindToMouseDown="Left"

member.name: T:Ai.Hong.Controls.Chart.ShowTrackerAndLeaveOpenBehavior.StayOpenTrackerManipulator.DeferredCompletedCall
member.summary: Monitors events that should trigger manipulator completion and calls an injected function when they fire

member.name: M:Ai.Hong.Controls.Chart.ShowTrackerAndLeaveOpenBehavior.StayOpenTrackerManipulator.DeferredCompletedCall.HookUp
member.summary: Start monitoring events. Their observer lists will keep us alive until is called.

member.name: M:Ai.Hong.Controls.Chart.ShowTrackerAndLeaveOpenBehavior.StayOpenTrackerManipulator.DeferredCompletedCall.Unhook
member.summary: Stop watching events. If they were the only things keeping us alive, we'll turn into garbage.
